name: StockMan (Bilimovivan)
description: StockMan is a 2d puzzle game powered by Adobe Animate. You are in a warehouse, control a loader and your main task is to move the boxes to the green points to go to the next level. With each level, the difficulty increases and the number of boxes increases. The controls support keyboard and gamepad. There are 11 levels in the game in total. The game is still in development.
